Necromancer/Hell Drak

	Necromancer looked around for a moment, trying to find an area with not
too many trees, as he and Hell Drak's beast modes were quite
large(remember, in beast mode they can carry up to 30 bots on their backs,
maybe more if on their tails.  Don't worry, they don't breathe fire or
anything, and they certainly don't want to ram ground targets).  

	"Well, me and my sister haven't been here for too long.  We landed here in
our stasis pods pretty close by," Necromancer then looked again, making
sure there was enough space, "And about beast modes.  I will show you mine
first," He said as he started running, then he transformed into a big, big
dragon!  He quickly shot up into the sky, so he didn't hit any surrounding
trees with his enormous body.

	Necromancer looked down at Dinobot and Tavatron.  They looked much
different from up here, "In our beast modes, we are capable of carrying
over 30 bots," He said and then queued Hell Drak to transform.

	Hell Drak nodded, but didn't say anything, and then ran and transformed,
going up into the sky beside her brother.

	She then looked down at Dinobot and Tavatron, "You two need a ride
anywhere?" 

	Necromancer looked at Dinobot and then moved his eyes towards Hell Drak.

	Necromancer doubted that they wanted a ride, but if they did, he wouldn't
let Hell Drak carry them, just in case she tried pulling a stunt.

	Necromancer looked down again, "If you need a lift, I'd be happy to help."
